summary: A defrocked Episcopal clergyman leads a bus-load of middle-aged Baptist women on a tour of the Mexican coast and comes to terms with the failure haunting his life.
cast: Richard Burton|Ava Gardner|Deborah Kerr|Sue Lyon|Skip Ward|Grayson Hall|Cyril Delevanti|Mary Boylan|Fidelmar Durán|Emilio Fernández|Eloise Hardt|Gladys Hill|Barbara Joyce|C.G. Kim|Roberto Leyva|Billie Matticks|Betty Proctor|Liz Rubey|Bernice Starr|Dorthy Vance|Thelda Victor
keywords: lesbian subtext|female sexual predator|taming of the shrew|manipulative female|romantic rivalry
title: La noche de la iguana
